description:
Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty amazons eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ace o Sukue! Arata na Mokutekichi wa Daikangoku
Saving Ace! The Next Stop: The Great Prison!
À la rescousse d`Ace ! Nouvelle destination : la grande prison
Спасти Эйса! Пункт назначения – Великая тюрьма
エースを救え! 新たな目的地は大監獄
